structure.unit: KENTUCKY ALCOHOL AND OTHER DRUG ABUSE PREVENTION, INTERVENTION, AND TREATMENT LAW

law.history: Repealed 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 108. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 166, sec. 1. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 125, sec. 3. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 1. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 106, Art. XII, sec. 2. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 2.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Kentucky commission on alcohol and drug problems -- Members -- Duties.
